result.execSummary:
The defendant Cynthia M. Kratofil was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cynthia M. Kratofil

defendant.name: Kratofil, Cynthia M.
defendant.address: 1563 E Madison St, Eau Claire, WI 54703

records.addlTxt: Reminder Notice indicating amount due mailed to defendant.

Case called at 11:13 AM.
Defendant Cynthia M. Kratofil appeared by video, in custody from the jail with Attorney Sonia Anderson.  Attorney Ryan Glenn Kohler in court for Cynthia M. Kratofil.  Prosecuting Attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Warrant quashed. State in compliance with victim notification requirements. Agreement has been reached. 
Count 1 is amended to County Ordinance; Disorderly Conduct. Defendant pleads No Contest and is sentenced to Court Costs.

9:36 AM case called. Prosecuting Attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Cynthia M. Kratofil not in court.  Attorney Ryan Glenn Kohler in court for Cynthia M. Kratofil. Attorney Kohler has no information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance. State requests warrant.

Warrant ordered.

9:45 AM case called Prosecuting Attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Cynthia M. Kratofil not in court.  Attorney Ryan Glenn Kohler in court for Cynthia M. Kratofil.
Hearing scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Judge Jon Theisen for Branch 2 intake. 
(Case called at 11:31 AM) Defendant Cynthia Kratofil appears in person with Attorney Ryan Kohler. ADA Afton Lewis appears in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense waives reading of complaint. Court clarifies no contact condition ordered. 
Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 08/08/2022 at 3:15 PM. 
Hearing: 09/06/2022 at 9:30 AM.

Conditions: 
No contact with F.V. - Defendant may go to her residence as long as she doesn't linger or loiter around the curtilage.
